click1: ^You place a foot down in this room and hear a foreboding click.
^Remove your foot, slowly, and return the way you came.£R

c-0: ^You stay perfectly still for a minute. Nothing happens.

click2: ^Gently put one foot on the floor.

c-0: ^Your scaly toes caress the stone floor as gently as you can.
c-1: ^You gently poke the floor with the spear's blade.
g-0: ^Another click. Silence follows. Further probing has no effect.

c-2: ^You check every surface and every nook for answers. Rapping walls and floor with the butt of your spear you make a circuit of the room - discovering almost nothing. Through one crack in one corner you see a glint of gears poised to activate a mechanism. The gap is too small to wedge anything inside.
^Next time you return here something will happen, you're sure of it.

click3: ^You pause at the entrance to the room that clicks.

c-0: ^You stride boldly in, daring the room to make a noise. Sure enough you hear a click followed by a chorus of plinks. In each corner of the room a small hole has opened.
^You dive and the stony floor slams into your snout as darts whistle over you. You hear them clatter harmlessly into the corners of the room.
^ You slowly raise yourself from the floor.

b: ^Your body arcs through the air, your curving tail completing an "O" through which whistling darts pass through. You land with the grace of a cat. It is a shame that no one was around to see that.
^You body arcs through the air, almost making a perfect "O". Three whistling darts fly underneath you and a forth slams into your tail.
^ You pull it out, the dart only caused minor damage.
^You jump, wriggle somewhat in the air, and then land on your head. Somewhere above you darts whistle past.

sprung: ^You inspect the holes that produced the darts and find a gold coin in each. A strange reward for your patience but you'll take what you can get.

trigger: ^You enter the room that used to click.

s0: ^You convince yourself for a moment that you heard it click again, but it was likely just one of your joints.

dive_death: ^Exhausted and injured you decide to stay here for a while. Perhaps take a nap. You don't wake up.
backflip_poison: ^You feel very heavy. That dart must have been poisoned, you think. Perhaps you can sleep it off. You lie down as the numbness takes over. You don't wake up.
backflip_head: ^You blackout from the blow and don't wake up.
